title: Factors affecting Ranked
body:
Smurfs/ Elo boosters: these guys make ranked play rather one sided
Duo's: they have better communication and less likely hood of surrender vote passing( is it possible to get 2 duo teams?)
Ping: you can play 500 games before 1 ranked and for some reason during that ranked game you get lag/high spike( we need an east coast server, any news on this?)
MMR rating: having to fight higher ranked opponents to achieve a lower rank, playing vs plts/golds to get placed in gold 5....
any missing?
